name: Cupid: Late For Valentines
description:
Game for Brackeys Game Jam #2

Name of the Game: “Cupid: Late for Valentines” 

 Main Character : Cupid Objective: 

Cupid must direct people “Blinded by Love” by using his “Love” arrows to find true love.

Cupid Abilities: Red and Green “Love Arrows”, Knockback arrow 

 Enemies: Blind Lovers looking for love but can't see them because of the blindfold...

Enemies are distinguished by colors. Red  & Green.

Cupid must use the corresponding color arrow so the blinded lover can see again, if the unblind lover is hit with the opposite color arrow he will become “Enraged” and attack cupid, If the lover is still blinded he will become "Enraged" and run around the map blind

If an unblinded lover pairs up with the opposite color cupid loses health(or heart) and chases him!

If an unblinded lover pairs up with the same color you gain score.

End goal: pair as many lovers as possible to get the highest score

Known Bugs: 

First time starting the game your character gets stuck, not sure why it happens...

First time running game the audio doesn't loop(unconfirmed)

Credits:

Coding, Level design, UI: Alakeram

Coding: Naggerknife

Art, Music, UI Art & Game Concept(Mr. Art-Man) Dave Clumsy
